description: Ms. codex. Title from note on fol. 1a. 23 lines per page. Written in small nastaʻlīq in black ink with use of red. Dark cream paper with laid lines and pulp visible. Ḥāshīyah on the margins. Catchword on the verso of each leaf. Fol. 291 is a later addition, with an ownership statement signed Muḥammad Laṭīf Afandī on the verso. Several inscriptions on fol. 1a: ownership statements ; verses of poetry and prayer in Persian. The lower part of the fol. is wanting. Saying attributed to Mawlānā Mubārakshāh on fol. 1b. Ownership statements and short waqf statement on fol. 2a. Inscription in red pencil using Arabic script on fol. 1a: "Raqm 94 ʻ". Incipit: اما بعد حمد واجب الوجود على نعمائه والصلوة على سيد انبيائه وعلى اكرم احبائه اى على اله واصحابه الذين هم موصوفون بزيادة الكرم End as extant: وتقرير الجواب ان هناك قسما ثالثا بيانه ان الحصول التدريجى حصول مل له هوية اتصالية متطبق على الزمان
author: Qūshjī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, -1474 or 1475
abstract: Commentary on Tajrīd al-ʻaqāʼid by Naṣīr al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī. Copy incomplete at end.
extent: 291 leaves: paper ; 241 x 130 (155 x 63) mm. bound to 243 x 150 mm.
title: Kitāb Sharḥ Tajrīd al-ʻaqāʻid.
uniform title: شرح القوشجي على تجريد العقاعد للطوسي
provenance: Several ownership statements (some obliterated or cut off) on fol. 1a and 2a, signed Muḥammad Laṭīf ibn Muḥammad Saʻīd Afandī (fol. 1a and 2a) ; al-[---?] ibn ʻAbd al-Laṭīf, dated Dār al-Sulṭān Iṣfahān, Muḥarram [---?], with seal (fol. 2a) ; Muḥammad Amīn al-Mudarris, with seal (fol. 2a) ; al-Sayyid Muḥammad Nāfiʻ Abū al-Suʻūd Muftīʹzādah, with seal dated 1276 H. [1859 or 60] (fol. 2a). Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: قوشجي، علي بن محمد
subject: Ṭūsī, Naṣīr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1201-1274—Tajrīd al-iʻtiqād.
binding note: Brown leather over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers, fore-edge flap and envelope flap. Red leather doublure.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
